content:
Hi I'm trying to do a production installation. All went good until I get this error at the last moment. Any help?

/home/zulip/deployments/current/manage.py generate_realm_creation_link

./manage.py: line 2: import: command not found
./manage.py: line 3: import: command not found
./manage.py: line 4: import: command not found
./manage.py: line 5: import: command not found
./manage.py: line 7: syntax error near unexpected token (' ./manage.py: line 7:BASE_DIR = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))'
@Priyan it looks like you ran it as a shell script, not a Python script.
